#summary The navigator.cpuClass property ...
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-microsoft

== Values ==

The `navigator.cpuClass` property returns a string.

[BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] returns the CPU type.  Example: `"x86"`

This property is read-only.
